text: Nitish Veera is an Indian actor who works in Tamil-language films. == Career == Veera has portrayed small roles in several of them including Pudhupettai (2006) and Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu (2009). He contacted Pa. Ranjith who gave him the role of Kathiravan, Rajinikanth and Eashwari Rao's son in Kaala (2018). He shot for the film for 40 days. Veera went on to portray an important role in Asuran (2019). In the film, he played a character that lived in the 1960s. He has been signed to play a pivotal role in Laabam. == Filmography == Source {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Key | style="background:#ffc;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
